# Prerequisites {-}

This book aims to contribute the solutions to Hadley Wickhams book [Advanced R](http://adv-r.had.co.nz/).
It is planed to finish until end of 2016. The code can be found on [github](https://github.com/Tazinho/Advanced-R-Solutions.git).

The date of the exercise versions is September 9th 2016.

```{r eval=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown")
date()
```


```{r include=FALSE}
# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(
  .packages(), 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown'
), 'packages.bib')
```
